metadata.title: CVE-2024-22373 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in theJPEG2000Codec::DecodeByStreamsCommon functionality of Mathieu MalaterreGrassroot DICOM 3.0.23. A specially crafted DICOM file can lead to a heapbuffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-22373` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgdcm-cil - 3.0.24-3build1
libgdcm-java - 3.0.24-3build1
libgdcm-tools - 3.0.24-3build1
libgdcm3.0t64 - 3.0.24-3build1
libvtkgdcm-9.1t64 - 3.0.24-3build1
libvtkgdcm-tools - 3.0.24-3build1
python3-gdcm - 3.0.24-3build1
python3-vtkgdcm - 3.0.24-3build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdcm package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.24-3build1').
